numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In all three categories, young women reach out more than young men.
3. I wonder why in-person visits are the least common form.
4. I wonder why young women usually reach out more than young men.
5. This impacts all kids in my high school.
6. This impacts me when I reach out to my parents.
7. The headline is: How much do teenagers reach out to their parents for help?
